text: Atlantic Records (Atlantic Recording Corporation) is a major record label. It sold rhythm and blues, rock and roll, and jazz. It was founded in October 1947 by Ahmet Erteg√ºn and Herb Abramson. Some of its groups included Cream, Led Zeppelin, Yes, and Foreigner. ==Recording artists== ==Related pages== * Jazz * Rock and roll * Record label ==References== Category:American record labels Category:1947 establishments in the United States
title: Atlantic Records
